item.description:
Dance at Whippersnappers

Saturday Dec. 10th. anytime after 7 pm. Band starts at 9:30 pm.

Whippersnappers

rt 102 Londonderry Commans

Londonderry NH. 03053

http://www.whippersnappersnh.com

Cover charge $5. after 7ish

Dance to Souled Out Show Band

Host:Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Steve O. wrote:

I am doing dinner and drinks at 7pm. Dance at 9:30pm..

        Join us for dinner or just for drinks with no cover charge until 7 ish, $20. two for dinners that are a real deal.  You can also just get there anytime you can. But, the cover charge usually starts at 7ish. The Band doesn't start til 9:30. So, we will be having dinner or drinks and dancing to the Dj after that.

        We have danced to this Band here many time before, and we danced all night. So come and get there early if you can. So Steve O. can introduce you to as many people as he can. Once the Band starts, everyone is on the dance floor. So, there is no one to introduce you too.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Dance at Whippersnapper's
